titleStmt.title: A proclamation, for the well ordering of the market in the cittie of Oxford and for the redresse of abuses, in weights and measures, within the precincts of the Vniuersitie of Oxford.
titleStmt.author: University of Oxford. Chancellor (1630-1641 : Laud)
Laud, William, 1573-1645.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Lichfield, printer to the Vniversitie,

notesStmt.note: Text begins: William by Gods providence Archbishop of Canterbury .. Chancellour of the Vniuersitie of Oxon sendeth greeting ..
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
